channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Behind the Curtain: What does AI owe YOU?
item.description: You could easily live without AI . But AI wouldn't exist without you. So does AI owe you for your small part in creating it? Why it matters: This ques...

item.title: MAGA expectations soar after DOJ orders Russia grand jury probe
item.description: The MAGA movement has spent the past 10 years demanding the arrests of President Trump's political enemies . Now, for the first time, the levers of po...

item.title: AI execs back OpenAI's open-source return
item.description: OpenAI's release of two open source models Tuesday propels the U.S. forward in its AI race with China, industry leaders told Axios. The big picture: T...

item.title: Axios interview: U.S. Army air defenses are a sizzling hot commodity
item.description: The demand for U.S. Army overhead defenses will not "be letting up anytime soon," a service leader told Axios on the sidelines of the Space and Missil...

item.title: Coast Guard report: Titan submersible implosion that killed 5 "preventable"
item.description: The Titan submersible implosion that killed five people occurred in large part because operator OceanGate had failed to follow "established engineerin...

item.title: A new low in bipartisanship: Trump hasn’t met with Schumer or Jeffries
item.description: Presidents traditionally host opposing party leaders early in their term, as Trump did in 2017, but that tradition is now gone.

item.title: The frozen Senate race against Susan Collins

item.title: Trump’s tactics are bending the criminal justice system to his personal preferences
item.description: Trump and his team have mounted a direct assault on all three pillars of the justice system: Judges, prosecutors and the legal profession.

item.title: Why Trump is targeting these programs that help keep drug users alive
item.description: The Trump administration has barred certain federal grants from funding some harm reduction programs, sparking concerns among health advocates.

item.title: How Trump blunted the far-right furor over Jeffrey Epstein
item.description: Trump remains under pressure from his base to deliver transparency in the Epstein case, but a review signals he found success in trying to change the ...

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Trump is under water on some of his top issues — including immigration, poll shows
item.description: The president’s approval rating had been ticking upward since its biggest drop in April.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
